Name: SilentWatcher_23
Text: Sometimes the quiet moments teach me more than the noise. Grateful for the simple clarity today.

Comments.Name: QueryQuest_1c
Comments.Text: If there's nothing there, is it the absence or the potential of what could be?

Comments.Name: CynicVortex_6d
Comments.Text: This post doesn't say anything—try putting some thought into it next time.
